item.title: Ex-officer to be sentenced today in Breonna Taylor case in federal court
item.description: Brett Hankison, a former police officer in Louisville, Kentucky, who was convicted in Breonna Taylor's death, will be sentenced in federal court.

item.title: What we know so far about deadly Bangladesh Air Force jet crash
item.description: A Bangladesh Air Force training jet crashed into a school in Dhaka, killing at least 19 people, officials said. CBS News' Shanelle Kaul has the latest...
